overview: When Anna uncovers an ancient relic in her backyard while gardening, she has no idea of its strong erotic powers. Contacting her old university professor Marcus, she tells him of her find, and he startlingly reveals that he has a similar relic. From the moment Anna has the strange object in her possession, her thoughts become filled with detailed erotic fantasy and obsession. And as the two continue to converse, it becomes clear that the relics are the source of an ancient sexual legend - and the only way to overcome their power is to succumb completely.
tagline: You Have to Try Everything Once.
title: No Inhibitions
